name: Bottle Apocalypse
description:
Bottle  Apocalypse is the one button game you'll need to blow off some steam and lighten up your everyday routine.
-----------------------------------------
In a city ruled by ruthless corporations prioritizing their own needs, the people decided to rise, for what's right, for the future and of course for the sake of their pockets.

During the people's march you stumble upon METACORP, a state of the art building where thousands of corporates are working towards making the city  a living hell for its inhabitants.

Logically you try to burn it, but the building is just one little sparkle away from reaching its end.

Take control of your destiny (and your molotov cocktail) to burn METACORP once and for all.

-----------------------------------------
